snippet: Mr. Hastert, a former speaker of the House, faces federal charges of illegally structuring bank withdrawals and lying to investigators.
abstract: Former House Speaker J Dennis Hastert pleads not guilty in federal court to charges that he structured cash withdrawals illegally as part of arrangement to pay unidentified person for misconduct and lied to authorities about arrangement; it is Hastert's first public appearance since charges were announced; case has raised questions and allegations of sexual misconduct on Hastert's part.

byline.original: By MONICA DAVEY, JULIE BOSMAN and MITCH SMITH

lead_paragraph: Mr. Hastert, a former speaker of the House, faces federal charges of illegally structuring bank withdrawals and lying to investigators.

headline.main: Dennis Hastert Pleads Not Guilty in Federal Case Targeting Bank Withdrawals
headline.print_headline: Hastert Pleads Not Guilty in Federal Case Targeting Bank Withdrawals
